1.name: The Void of Magnus
1.desc: You float aimlessly in Magnus's void

2.name: Void of Apocrypha
2.desc:
You seem to float aimlessly in the a void-like space. There is a greenish dark
hue to the atmosphere spanning in all directions. Slimy black tentacles seem
to spawn out of nowhere around a large dense mass in the center. An enourmous
eye floats betwist the tentacles and begins to speak....

3.name: Black Room
3.desc:
Large black |cbookshelves|G surround the room and a large desk appears to be
attached to the ground by black vines. The vines seem to shift about creating
an illusion of an organic mass moving about. Behind the desk sits a character
about eight feet in height and large tendrils flapping about where its mouth
would be.

edesc.bookshelves:
Large and black and night, these book shelves all contain books
with no covers or any sort of identification. Along the edges of the shelves
large figures sit motionless almost like drawn to the eternal life of
research.

4.name: an unfinished room
4.desc: You are in an unfinished room.
